tasks.title: Setup Laravel 11 Project with Required Packages
tasks.description: Install required packages for authentication, permissions, payments, and real-time features in the existing Laravel 11 project.
tasks.details: Working with existing Laravel 11.x installation on Laragon environment. Install packages: laravel/cashier (Stripe integration), spatie/laravel-permission (role management), laravel/sanctum (API auth), laravel/reverb (real-time features), intervention/image (image handling), laravel/horizon (queue monitoring), spatie/laravel-activitylog (activity tracking). Use Vite for asset bundling, Tailwind CSS for styling, Alpine.js for interactivity. Configure .env for sensitive keys and basic environment setup.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify package installation and environment configuration. Test basic routes and authentication setup.

subtasks.title: Verify System Requirements
subtasks.description: Check that the system meets all prerequisites for Laravel 11, including PHP version, Composer, web server, and database.
subtasks.details: Ensure PHP 8.1+, Composer, Apache/Nginx, and a supported database (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, or SQL Server) are installed and configured.

subtasks.title: Install Laravel 11
subtasks.description: Create a new Laravel 11 project using Composer.
subtasks.details: Run `composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel project-name "11.*"` to install Laravel 11 in a new directory.

subtasks.title: Set File Permissions
subtasks.description: Configure file permissions for storage and cache directories.
subtasks.details: Set permissions for `storage` and `bootstrap/cache` directories to ensure Laravel can write logs and cache files.

subtasks.title: Configure .env File
subtasks.description: Set up environment variables for database and other services in the .env file.
subtasks.details: Edit the `.env` file to configure database connection and other environment-specific settings.

subtasks.title: Install Authentication Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure Laravel Breeze, Jetstream, or Fortify for authentication.
subtasks.details: Choose and install an authentication package, publish its configuration, and run migrations.

subtasks.title: Install Payment Integration Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure a payment gateway package (e.g., Laravel Cashier for Stripe).
subtasks.details: Install the payment package, update .env with API keys, and publish configuration files.

subtasks.title: Install Permissions/Role Management Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure a package like spatie/laravel-permission.
subtasks.details: Install the package, publish its config, and run migrations for roles and permissions.

subtasks.title: Install Real-Time Communication Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure Laravel Echo and a broadcasting driver (e.g., Pusher).
subtasks.details: Install Laravel Echo, set up broadcasting in config, and update .env with relevant credentials.

subtasks.title: Install Image Handling Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure a package like intervention/image for image uploads and processing.
subtasks.details: Install the image package, publish its config, and test basic image upload and manipulation.

subtasks.title: Install Queue Monitoring Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure Laravel Horizon for queue monitoring.
subtasks.details: Install Horizon, publish its config, and set up the dashboard route and authentication.

subtasks.title: Install Activity Logging Package
subtasks.description: Install and configure a package like spatie/laravel-activitylog.
subtasks.details: Install the activity log package, publish its config, and run migrations.

subtasks.title: Install Debugging Tools
subtasks.description: Install and configure Laravel Debugbar or Telescope.
subtasks.details: Install the debugging package, publish its config, and verify it appears in the development environment.

subtasks.title: Set Up Asset Bundling
subtasks.description: Install and configure Vite or Laravel Mix for asset compilation.
subtasks.details: Install the asset bundler, configure scripts in package.json, and test asset compilation.

subtasks.title: Comprehensive Integration Testing
subtasks.description: Test all installed packages and their integrations for conflicts and correct operation.
subtasks.details: Write and run tests to verify that all packages work together and that no conflicts exist.

subtasks.title: Final Environment Verification
subtasks.description: Verify the application environment, permissions, and all integrations in development and production modes.
subtasks.details: Check .env, permissions, and run the application in both environments to ensure stability and correctness.

tasks.title: Implement Core Database Schema and Migrations
tasks.description: Create and migrate core database tables for users, subscriptions, roles, permissions, content, alerts, courses, chat, and events.
tasks.details: Define and implement migrations for: users, subscriptions, roles, permissions, model_has_roles, model_has_permissions, posts, trading_alerts, courses, course_enrollments, chat_channels, chat_messages, events, event_registrations. Use Eloquent ORM for relationships. Add indexes for frequently queried columns. Ensure schema matches PRD requirements.
tasks.testStrategy: Test migrations, seed test data, verify relationships and constraints. Check for proper indexing and data integrity.

subtasks.title: Entity Identification
subtasks.description: Identify and define all core entities required for the multi-feature platform, such as users, subscriptions, roles, content, chat, and events.
subtasks.details: List all business modules and break them down into discrete entities. Capture attributes and relationships at a high level.

subtasks.title: Table Design
subtasks.description: Design normalized tables for each identified entity, ensuring appropriate primary keys and data types are selected.
subtasks.details: Apply normalization best practices (aim for 3NF where appropriate) and define surrogate or natural primary keys for each table.

subtasks.title: Relationship Mapping
subtasks.description: Map out all relationships between tables, including one-to-one, one-to-many, and many-to-many associations.
subtasks.details: Define foreign keys and junction tables as needed. Document cardinality and referential actions (cascade, restrict, etc.).

subtasks.title: Migration Scripting
subtasks.description: Develop migration scripts to create the database schema, tables, relationships, and constraints in the target DBMS.
subtasks.details: Write version-controlled migration scripts using a tool like Flyway, Liquibase, or native DB migration frameworks.

subtasks.title: Indexing Strategy
subtasks.description: Design and implement indexes to optimize query performance for common access patterns and relationships.
subtasks.details: Identify columns frequently used in WHERE clauses, joins, and sorting. Create appropriate single-column and composite indexes.

subtasks.title: Data Seeding
subtasks.description: Create scripts to seed the database with initial and sample data for development, testing, and demonstration purposes.
subtasks.details: Populate tables with representative data, ensuring referential integrity and realistic scenarios for all modules.

subtasks.title: Constraint Verification
subtasks.description: Verify that all primary key, foreign key, unique, and check constraints are correctly implemented and enforced.
subtasks.details: Test constraint enforcement by attempting operations that should fail (e.g., inserting duplicates, violating referential integrity).

subtasks.title: Schema Optimization
subtasks.description: Analyze and optimize the schema for scalability, performance, and maintainability, considering denormalization or partitioning if needed.
subtasks.details: Review query plans, monitor for hotspots, and adjust schema design (e.g., sharding, denormalization) to address bottlenecks.

subtasks.title: Documentation
subtasks.description: Document the schema, including entity definitions, relationships, constraints, indexing strategies, and migration processes.
subtasks.details: Produce ER diagrams, data dictionaries, and written guides for developers and stakeholders. Ensure documentation is clear and up-to-date.

subtasks.title: Review and Iteration Cycle
subtasks.description: Conduct peer reviews and iterative feedback cycles to validate the schema design, scripts, and documentation.
subtasks.details: Organize review sessions, gather feedback, and refine the schema and documentation as needed before production deployment.

tasks.title: Build User Authentication and Role-Based Access
tasks.description: Implement secure user registration, login, and role-based access control for free and premium users.
tasks.details: Use Laravel Sanctum for API/auth, Spatie/laravel-permission for roles (Admin, Premium, Free). Implement registration, login, password reset, and email verification by integrating with existing UI designs in the templates folder. Assign default roles on registration. Secure all endpoints with middleware. Enable CSRF protection and rate limiting.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration, login, role assignment, and access control. Verify security headers and rate limiting.

subtasks.title: User Registration Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop the backend and frontend flows for new user registration, including input validation, secure password handling, and initial role assignment.
subtasks.details: Ensure secure storage of user credentials using hashing and salting. Validate all user inputs to prevent injection attacks. Integrate with email verification to activate accounts.

subtasks.title: User Login Implementation
subtasks.description: Create secure login endpoints and UI, supporting both password-based and federated authentication methods.
subtasks.details: Use HTTPS/TLS for all authentication communication. Implement rate limiting and logging for login attempts. Support federated login (e.g., OAuth2, SSO) if required.

subtasks.title: Password Reset Flow
subtasks.description: Implement a secure password reset mechanism, including token generation, email delivery, and password update endpoints.
subtasks.details: Ensure reset tokens are securely generated, time-limited, and single-use. Use secure channels for all communications and validate new passwords before updating.

subtasks.title: Email Verification Process
subtasks.description: Develop the email verification workflow to confirm user email addresses during registration and password reset.
subtasks.details: Send verification emails with secure, expiring tokens. Prevent account activation or password reset until verification is complete.

subtasks.title: Role Assignment and Management
subtasks.description: Design and implement role assignment logic during registration and provide administrative interfaces for role management.
subtasks.details: Apply the principle of least privilege. Store roles securely and ensure they are enforced throughout the application.

subtasks.title: Middleware Integration for Endpoint Protection
subtasks.description: Integrate authentication and authorization middleware to protect API endpoints and enforce role-based access control.
subtasks.details: Use middleware to check authentication status and user roles before granting access to protected resources. Log all access attempts for auditing.

subtasks.title: UI Integration for Authentication Flows
subtasks.description: Develop and connect frontend components for registration, login, password reset, email verification, and role-based UI rendering.
subtasks.details: Ensure a seamless user experience and clear feedback for all authentication-related actions. Display UI elements based on user roles.

subtasks.title: Security Hardening
subtasks.description: Apply security best practices across all authentication and authorization flows, including secure storage, session management, and input validation.
subtasks.details: Enforce HTTPS, secure cookies, session timeouts, and regular security audits. Use trusted libraries for cryptography and authentication. Monitor for suspicious activity.

subtasks.title: Comprehensive Testing and Auditing
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of all authentication and authorization flows, including unit, integration, and security tests.
subtasks.details: Test for common vulnerabilities (e.g., injection, session hijacking), verify role enforcement, and perform penetration testing. Review logs and monitor for anomalies.

tasks.title: Integrate Stripe Subscription Billing with Laravel Cashier
tasks.description: Set up Stripe integration for subscription management, including trial periods, upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations.
tasks.details: Configure Laravel Cashier for Stripe. Implement subscription plans (monthly/annual), webhook handling for payment events, invoice generation, and receipt management. Add subscription lifecycle management UI (upgrade/downgrade/cancel).
tasks.testStrategy: Test subscription creation, upgrade, downgrade, cancellation, and webhook handling. Verify invoice and receipt generation.

subtasks.title: Install and Configure Laravel Cashier
subtasks.description: Install the Laravel Cashier package, publish migrations and configuration, and run database migrations to prepare the application for Stripe integration.
subtasks.details: Run 'composer require laravel/cashier', publish migrations with 'php artisan vendor:publish --tag="cashier-migrations"', and run 'php artisan migrate'. Publish the Cashier config if needed.

subtasks.title: Set Up Stripe API Keys and Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Add Stripe API keys and webhook secret to the .env file and ensure they are loaded into the application configuration.
subtasks.details: Add STRIPE_KEY, STRIPE_SECRET, and STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET to the .env file. Verify that these are correctly referenced in config/services.php.

subtasks.title: Enable Billable Trait on User Model
subtasks.description: Add the Billable trait to the User model to enable subscription and payment features provided by Cashier.
subtasks.details: Use 'use Laravel\Cashier\Billable;' in the User model and add 'use Billable;' inside the class.

subtasks.title: Create and Configure Subscription Plans in Stripe
subtasks.description: Define and set up subscription plans and pricing in the Stripe dashboard, and document their identifiers for use in the application.
subtasks.details: Log in to the Stripe dashboard, create products and pricing plans, and note the price IDs for integration with Cashier.

subtasks.title: Develop Pricing and Checkout UI
subtasks.description: Create frontend views for displaying available plans and initiating the checkout process.
subtasks.details: Build a 'pricing' Blade view and add navigation. Implement a controller to handle checkout initiation.

subtasks.title: Implement Checkout and Subscription Logic
subtasks.description: Develop backend logic to handle Stripe checkout sessions, subscription creation, and plan selection using Cashier.
subtasks.details: Create a CheckoutController to handle subscription requests, use Cashier's methods to create and manage subscriptions.

subtasks.title: Set Up Stripe Webhook Endpoint
subtasks.description: Configure and secure a webhook endpoint to receive and process Stripe events such as payment success, failed payments, and subscription updates.
subtasks.details: Use 'php artisan cashier:webhook' to generate the endpoint, configure Stripe to send events, and handle relevant webhook events in the application.

subtasks.title: Automate Invoice and Receipt Management
subtasks.description: Implement logic to generate, store, and send invoices and receipts for successful payments and subscriptions.
subtasks.details: Use Cashier's invoice and receipt features to generate documents and email them to users after successful transactions.

subtasks.title: Handle Payment Edge Cases and Compliance
subtasks.description: Implement logic for handling failed payments, subscription cancellations, resumptions, and ensure compliance with Stripe and legal requirements.
subtasks.details: Add logic to manage failed payments, retries, cancellations, and resumption. Ensure compliance with PCI and local regulations.

subtasks.title: Perform End-to-End Testing of Subscription Billing
subtasks.description: Test the entire Stripe integration workflow, including plan selection, checkout, webhook handling, invoice generation, and UI interactions.
subtasks.details: Use Stripe test cards and the Stripe CLI to simulate all payment scenarios. Verify UI, backend logic, and webhook processing.

tasks.title: Develop Basic Livewire Dashboard and Navigation
tasks.description: Create a responsive dashboard with navigation, user profile, and basic metrics using Livewire components.
tasks.details: Build Livewire components for dashboard, navigation, user profile. Use Tailwind CSS for responsive design. Implement collapsible sidebar for desktop, bottom nav for mobile. Display user info, basic metrics (open positions, P&L, alerts, messages). Utilize converted Livewire components from the templates folder.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard rendering, navigation, and responsiveness across devices. Verify user data display.

subtasks.title: Layout Design
subtasks.description: Design the overall dashboard layout, including grid structure, spacing, and placement of key sections such as navigation, metrics, and user profile.
subtasks.details: Define wireframes or mockups for the dashboard. Ensure the layout supports modular Livewire components and allows for easy expansion. Consider best practices for organizing components for maintainability.[1][3]

subtasks.title: Navigation Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop a responsive navigation system that allows users to access different dashboard sections efficiently.
subtasks.details: Create a Livewire component for navigation. Ensure it adapts to different screen sizes and supports dynamic highlighting of active sections. Integrate with the overall layout and test for usability.[3]

subtasks.title: User Profile Component
subtasks.description: Build a Livewire component to display and manage user profile information within the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Implement data loading using Livewire lifecycle hooks. Allow for profile editing and state management. Ensure efficient data handling and local state updates for smooth user experience.[1]

subtasks.title: Metrics Display Integration
subtasks.description: Create and integrate Livewire components to display key metrics and statistics on the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Design metric tiles or cards that update in real-time or on demand. Use Livewire's data binding and loading indicators for dynamic updates. Optimize for performance with lazy loading and pagination if needed.[1][4]

subtasks.title: Responsive Design Implementation
subtasks.description: Ensure the dashboard layout and components are fully responsive across various device sizes.
subtasks.details: Apply CSS frameworks or custom styles to make the dashboard adapt to mobile, tablet, and desktop screens. Test component stacking, resizing, and navigation behavior on different viewports.[3]

subtasks.title: Component Integration and State Management
subtasks.description: Integrate all Livewire components into the dashboard and manage their state efficiently.
subtasks.details: Ensure components communicate as needed, share state where appropriate, and avoid unnecessary re-renders. Use local and global state management strategies for optimal performance.[1]

subtasks.title: Cross-Device and Cross-Browser Testing
subtasks.description: Test the dashboard on multiple devices and browsers to ensure consistent functionality and appearance.
subtasks.details: Perform manual and automated testing on major browsers and devices. Verify navigation, metrics updates, profile management, and responsiveness. Address any compatibility issues found.

tasks.title: Implement Content Management System
tasks.description: Develop a system for creating, categorizing, and displaying posts with premium content differentiation.
tasks.details: Build Livewire components for post creation, editing, and display. Support multi-category filtering (All, Cryptocurrencies, Premium, Premium Analysis, Global Markets, Commodities). Implement premium content flagging and visual differentiation (gradient styling, diamond icons). Enable list/grid view toggle.
tasks.testStrategy: Test post creation, editing, filtering, and premium content display. Verify visual differentiation and view toggle.

subtasks.title: Implement Post Creation Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop backend and frontend logic to allow users to create new posts, including support for title, content, category selection, and premium status.
subtasks.details: Ensure form validation, error handling, and database integration for storing post data.

subtasks.title: Develop Post Editing Capability
subtasks.description: Enable users to edit existing posts, updating content, categories, and premium status as needed.
subtasks.details: Implement edit forms, pre-fill with existing data, and handle update operations securely.

subtasks.title: Build Post Display Components
subtasks.description: Create frontend components to display posts, showing title, content preview, category, and premium indicators.
subtasks.details: Ensure responsive design and accessibility for all display elements.

subtasks.title: Implement Category Filtering
subtasks.description: Allow users to filter displayed posts by category, updating the view dynamically based on selection.
subtasks.details: Support multiple categories and ensure filtering works efficiently with large datasets.

subtasks.title: Differentiate Premium Content
subtasks.description: Visually and functionally distinguish premium posts from regular posts in both creation and display interfaces.
subtasks.details: Add premium badges, restricted content previews, and clear calls to action for non-premium users.

subtasks.title: Enable View Toggling
subtasks.description: Provide users with options to toggle between different post views (e.g., list, grid, detailed).
subtasks.details: Maintain state across navigation and ensure accessibility for all view modes.

subtasks.title: Implement Access Control for Premium Content
subtasks.description: Restrict access to premium posts based on user authentication and subscription status.
subtasks.details: Integrate with authentication system and enforce backend checks to prevent unauthorized access.

subtasks.title: Comprehensive Testing and QA
subtasks.description: Test all features including post creation, editing, display, filtering, premium differentiation, view toggling, and access control for correctness and security.
subtasks.details: Include unit, integration, and end-to-end tests; address edge cases and ensure robust error handling.

tasks.title: Build Real-Time Chat System with Channel-Based Architecture
tasks.description: Develop a real-time, multi-channel chat system with user avatars, timestamps, and premium channel access using Laravel Reverb for WebSocket functionality.
tasks.details: Use Livewire and Laravel Reverb (Laravel's official WebSocket server) for real-time chat functionality. Implement channels (General, Analysis, Options, Premium). Add user avatars, timestamps, message threading, reactions, and status indicators. Restrict premium channels to premium users. Optimize for mobile.
tasks.testStrategy: Test chat message sending, real-time updates through Laravel Reverb, channel access, and mobile responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Set up channel management system
subtasks.description: Implement a system to create, edit, and delete chat channels
subtasks.details: Design database schema for channels, create API endpoints for CRUD operations, implement channel listing and search functionality

subtasks.title: Develop real-time messaging infrastructure
subtasks.description: Create a robust real-time messaging system using WebSockets or similar technology
subtasks.details: Set up WebSocket server, implement message broadcasting, handle connection management and reconnection logic

subtasks.title: Implement avatar handling
subtasks.description: Create a system for users to upload, crop, and manage their avatars
subtasks.details: Implement image upload functionality, create avatar cropping tool, set up avatar storage and retrieval system

subtasks.title: Add timestamp functionality
subtasks.description: Implement accurate timestamps for all messages and events in the chat system
subtasks.details: Create a standardized timestamp format, implement server-side timestamp generation, handle timezone conversions

subtasks.title: Develop message threading
subtasks.description: Create a system for threaded conversations within chat channels
subtasks.details: Design UI for threaded messages, implement backend logic for thread creation and retrieval, update real-time messaging to support threads

subtasks.title: Implement reaction system
subtasks.description: Add the ability for users to react to messages with emojis or custom reactions
subtasks.details: Create reaction picker UI, implement backend storage for reactions, update real-time system to broadcast reaction changes

subtasks.title: Develop access control system
subtasks.description: Implement role-based access control for channels and features
subtasks.details: Design role hierarchy, create permission system, implement access checks in API and frontend

subtasks.title: Optimize for mobile devices
subtasks.description: Ensure the chat system is fully responsive and optimized for mobile use
subtasks.details: Create responsive layouts, implement touch-friendly interactions, optimize performance for mobile networks

subtasks.title: Configure Reverb integration
subtasks.description: Set up and configure Reverb for enhanced audio communication within the chat system
subtasks.details: Integrate Reverb SDK, implement audio channel creation, handle audio streaming and processing

subtasks.title: Implement comprehensive testing suite
subtasks.description: Develop a thorough testing strategy covering unit, integration, and end-to-end tests
subtasks.details: Write unit tests for core components, create integration tests for API endpoints, develop end-to-end tests for critical user flows

subtasks.title: Perform security audit
subtasks.description: Conduct a comprehensive security audit of the entire chat system
subtasks.details: Review authentication mechanisms, check for vulnerabilities in real-time communication, assess data encryption practices

subtasks.title: Implement analytics and monitoring
subtasks.description: Set up analytics and monitoring systems for tracking usage and performance
subtasks.details: Integrate analytics tools, set up performance monitoring, create dashboards for key metrics

tasks.title: Develop Trading Alert System with Performance Tracking
tasks.description: Create a system for generating, distributing, and tracking trading alerts with performance analytics.
tasks.details: Build Livewire components for alert creation, distribution, and display. Track alert success rates, average returns, risk metrics. Display individual alert cards with company logos, technical analysis, and embedded charts. Implement color-coded status indicators and performance dashboards.
tasks.testStrategy: Test alert creation, distribution, performance tracking, and dashboard display. Verify chart integration and analytics.

subtasks.title: Alert Creation
subtasks.description: Develop a system to generate trading alerts based on predefined conditions.
subtasks.details: This involves setting up algorithms to monitor market data and trigger alerts when specific criteria are met.

subtasks.title: Alert Distribution
subtasks.description: Implement a multi-channel alert distribution system (e.g., email, SMS, app notifications).
subtasks.details: Ensure that alerts are delivered promptly and reliably across different platforms.

subtasks.title: Performance Tracking
subtasks.description: Design a system to track the performance of trading alerts (e.g., success rate, response time).
subtasks.details: This involves collecting and analyzing data on how well alerts perform in real-time.

subtasks.title: Analytics Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create a dashboard to visualize alert performance and trading data.
subtasks.details: The dashboard should provide insights into alert effectiveness and market trends.

subtasks.title: Card Display
subtasks.description: Develop UI components to display key alert information in a concise format.
subtasks.details: Ensure that the display is user-friendly and easily accessible.

subtasks.title: Chart Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate interactive charts to visualize trading data and alert triggers.
subtasks.details: Charts should be dynamic and update in real-time to reflect market changes.

subtasks.title: Status Indicators
subtasks.description: Implement status indicators to show the current state of trading alerts (e.g., active, pending, resolved).
subtasks.details: Indicators should be clear and easily understandable by users.

subtasks.title: Monitoring
subtasks.description: Set up a monitoring system to ensure the alert system operates correctly and efficiently.
subtasks.details: This includes monitoring for errors, latency issues, and system downtime.

subtasks.title: System Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of the entire alert system to ensure all components work as expected.
subtasks.details: Testing should cover all scenarios, including edge cases and stress conditions.

tasks.title: Implement P&L Tracking and Trade Documentation
tasks.description: Develop a system for tracking profit and loss, trade documentation, and performance analytics.
tasks.details: Build Livewire components for P&L dashboard, trade cards, and performance analytics. Support screenshot integration for trade transparency. Display weekly gains, total operations, success rates, best trades. Enable public P&L sharing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test trade documentation, P&L calculation, dashboard display, and public sharing.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Layout
subtasks.description: Create a wireframe and mockup for the P&L tracking dashboard
subtasks.details: Include sections for overview, detailed trades, and performance metrics

subtasks.title: Implement Trade Documentation System
subtasks.description: Develop a system for recording and organizing trade details

subtasks.title: Integrate Analytics Engine

subtasks.details: Implement algorithms for profit/loss calculations and performance analysis

subtasks.title: Develop Media Upload Feature
subtasks.description: Create functionality for uploading and attaching media to trades
subtasks.details: Implement file upload system and storage solution for trade-related media

subtasks.title: Implement Weekly Reporting
subtasks.description: Develop automated weekly report generation
subtasks.details: Create report templates and scheduling system for weekly P&L summaries

subtasks.title: Create Public Sharing Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement feature for sharing specific P&L data publicly
subtasks.details: Develop secure sharing mechanism and public-facing views for shared data

subtasks.title: Conduct System Testing
subtasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing of all implemented features
subtasks.details: Create test cases and conduct unit, integration, and user acceptance testing

subtasks.title: Finalize Documentation and User Guide
subtasks.description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the P&L tracking system
subtasks.details: Create user manual, API documentation, and system architecture overview

tasks.title: Develop Event Management System

tasks.details: Build Livewire components for event creation, scheduling, registration, and speaker management. Support premium event differentiation, limited capacity, exclusive content, and timezone support. Implement RSVP and capacity management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test event creation, registration, scheduling, and premium access. Verify capacity management and timezone support.

subtasks.title: Design event creation interface
subtasks.description: Create a user-friendly interface for organizers to input event details
subtasks.details: Include fields for event name, date, time, location, description, and premium/free status

subtasks.title: Implement event scheduling system

subtasks.details: Create database schema for events, implement conflict checking, and timezone handling

subtasks.title: Build registration process
subtasks.description: Create a registration flow for attendees

subtasks.title: Develop speaker management module
subtasks.description: Create a system to manage speakers for events

subtasks.title: Implement premium event differentiation
subtasks.description: Add features to distinguish between premium and free events

subtasks.title: Create capacity management system
subtasks.description: Develop a system to manage event capacity and waitlists
subtasks.details: Implement attendee limits, waitlist functionality, and automatic notifications

subtasks.title: Integrate analytics dashboard
subtasks.description: Create a dashboard for event analytics and reporting

subtasks.title: Perform comprehensive testing
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of all event management features
subtasks.details: Include unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing

subtasks.title: Optimize system performance
subtasks.description: Improve overall system performance and scalability
subtasks.details: Conduct load testing, optimize database queries, and implement caching strategies

tasks.title: Build Learning Management System (LMS)
tasks.description: Develop a course catalog with free and premium content, progress tracking, and video integration.
tasks.details: Build Livewire components for course catalog, enrollment, progress tracking, and video delivery. Support beginner to advanced progression paths. Implement premium course access controls and visual differentiation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test course creation, enrollment, progress tracking, and premium access. Verify video integration and progression paths.

subtasks.title: Design Course Catalog Structure
subtasks.description: Create a database schema and API endpoints for the course catalog
subtasks.details: Define tables for courses, categories, and metadata. Implement CRUD operations and search functionality.

subtasks.title: Implement Enrollment System
subtasks.description: Develop user enrollment and course registration functionality
subtasks.details: Create user accounts, handle course registration, and manage enrollment status.

subtasks.title: Build Progress Tracking Module
subtasks.description: Create a system to track and display user progress in courses
subtasks.details: Implement progress calculation, store completion data, and create progress visualization components.

subtasks.title: Integrate Video Delivery Platform
subtasks.description: Set up video hosting and streaming capabilities for course content
subtasks.details: Choose a video platform, implement video upload, and create a video player component.

subtasks.title: Design Progression Paths
subtasks.description: Create a system for defining and managing course progression paths
subtasks.details: Implement path creation tools, prerequisite management, and path visualization.

subtasks.title: Develop Premium Access Features
subtasks.description: Implement premium content gating and subscription management
subtasks.details: Create subscription tiers, payment integration, and access control for premium content.

subtasks.title: Create Visual Differentiation System
subtasks.description: Implement visual cues to distinguish between free and premium content
subtasks.details: Design and implement UI components for content type indication and premium badges.

subtasks.title: Develop Assessment Tools
subtasks.description: Create a system for building and managing course assessments
subtasks.details: Implement question types, assessment creation tools, and scoring mechanisms.

subtasks.title: Implement Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Set up a comprehensive testing system for the LMS
subtasks.details: Create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all major components.

subtasks.title: Design User Interface
subtasks.description: Create a responsive and intuitive user interface for the LMS

tasks.title: Integrate HTML/CSS/JS Templates into Laravel Livewire Components
tasks.description: Convert existing UI designs from the templates/Template/ directory (dashboard.html, feed.html, chat.html, etc.) into reusable Livewire components that integrate with the Laravel backend.
tasks.details:
This task involves transforming static HTML/CSS/JS templates into dynamic Livewire components:

1. Analyze the existing templates in templates/Template/ directory to identify common elements and page structures.
2. Create a component hierarchy plan that maps template files to corresponding Livewire components:
   - dashboard.html  App\Http\Livewire\Dashboard\DashboardComponent
   - feed.html  App\Http\Livewire\Feed\FeedComponent
   - chat.html  App\Http\Livewire\Chat\ChatComponent
   - profile.html  App\Http\Livewire\Profile\ProfileComponent
   - alerts.html  App\Http\Livewire\Alerts\AlertsComponent

3. Extract reusable UI elements into separate components:
   - Navigation sidebar/header  App\Http\Livewire\Layout\NavigationComponent
   - User profile card  App\Http\Livewire\User\ProfileCardComponent
   - Chart widgets  App\Http\Livewire\Widgets\ChartComponent
   - Alert cards  App\Http\Livewire\Alerts\AlertCardComponent
   - Feed posts  App\Http\Livewire\Feed\PostComponent

4. Implement each Livewire component:
   - Move HTML from templates to Livewire component views
   - Convert inline JavaScript to Alpine.js directives where appropriate
   - Replace static content with dynamic data bindings
   - Implement component methods for user interactions
   - Ensure proper event handling between components

5. Maintain the existing CSS classes and styling while integrating with Tailwind CSS:
   - Preserve custom CSS classes from templates
   - Use Tailwind's @apply directive for consistent styling
   - Ensure responsive design elements are preserved

6. Integrate components with Laravel backend:
   - Connect components to Eloquent models
   - Implement proper data loading and pagination
   - Add authentication and authorization checks
   - Ensure real-time updates work with Laravel Reverb

7. Optimize assets:
   - Extract and organize JavaScript from templates
   - Optimize and compress images
   - Configure proper asset bundling with Vite
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Component Rendering Tests:
   - Create PHPUnit tests for each major Livewire component
   - Verify components render without errors
   - Test that components display expected content based on test data

2. Interactive Testing:
   - Test all interactive elements (buttons, forms, dropdowns)
   - Verify Alpine.js interactions work as expected
   - Test real-time updates and WebSocket connections

3. Responsive Design Testing:
   - Test each component at multiple viewport sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
   - Verify that responsive design elements match the original templates
   - Ensure no layout issues or overflow problems

4. Integration Testing:
   - Test component interactions with the Laravel backend
   - Verify data binding and updates work correctly
   - Test authentication and authorization restrictions

5. Browser Compatibility:
   - Test components in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
   - Verify consistent appearance and functionality across browsers

6. Performance Testing:
   - Measure component load times and rendering performance
   - Test with different network conditions
   - Verify efficient DOM updates with Livewire

7. Manual Visual Comparison:
   - Compare rendered Livewire components side-by-side with original templates
   - Verify visual consistency and design fidelity
   - Document any intentional deviations from original designs

tasks.title: Implement Real-Time Notifications System with Laravel Reverb
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive real-time notifications system using Laravel Reverb that supports browser notifications, in-app notifications, and notification badges for trading alerts, chat messages, events, and other platform activities.
tasks.details:
This task involves building a robust real-time notifications system using Laravel Reverb:

1. Database Structure:
   - Create notifications table with fields for: id, user_id, type, content, related_entity_id, related_entity_type, read_status, created_at, updated_at
   - Create notification_preferences table with fields for: user_id, notification_type, email_enabled, browser_enabled, in_app_enabled

2. Backend Implementation:
   - Create NotificationService class to handle notification creation, distribution, and storage
   - Implement Laravel Reverb WebSocket server configuration for real-time delivery
   - Create notification channels for different types: TradingAlertChannel, ChatMessageChannel, EventChannel, SystemChannel
   - Develop notification templates for each notification type
   - Implement read/unread status tracking and batch operations
   - Create notification history with pagination and filtering
   - Build RESTful API endpoints for notification management

3. Frontend Implementation:
   - Create Livewire components for notification display:
     - NotificationBadgeComponent (shows unread count)
     - NotificationDropdownComponent (shows recent notifications)
     - NotificationCenterComponent (full notification history and management)
   - Implement browser notifications using the Web Notifications API
   - Add notification sounds with user-configurable options
   - Create notification preference settings UI

4. Integration Points:
   - Hook into Trading Alert System (Task #8) to trigger notifications on new alerts
   - Connect with Chat System (Task #7) to notify on new messages
   - Integrate with Event Management (Task #10) for event reminders and updates
   - Add notification triggers to other relevant system actions

5. User Experience:
   - Implement real-time notification badges with count indicators
   - Add subtle animations for new notifications
   - Create color-coding based on notification type and urgency
   - Implement mark-as-read functionality (individual and batch)
   - Add ability to dismiss or delete notifications

6. Performance Considerations:
   - Implement efficient WebSocket connections with Laravel Reverb
   - Add database indexes for notification queries
   - Consider caching strategies for frequent notification checks
   - Implement batch processing for high-volume notification scenarios
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit Testing:
   - Test NotificationService methods for creating and distributing notifications
   - Verify notification preference settings are respected
   - Test read/unread status tracking functionality
   - Validate notification history retrieval with pagination

2. Integration Testing:
   - Test WebSocket connections with Laravel Reverb
   - Verify notifications are triggered correctly from Trading Alerts, Chat Messages, and Events
   - Test notification delivery across different user roles and preference settings
   - Validate real-time updates in the UI when notifications are received

3. Frontend Testing:
   - Test notification badge updates in real-time
   - Verify browser notifications appear correctly when enabled
   - Test notification center UI for proper display and interaction
   - Validate notification preference settings UI functions correctly

4. Performance Testing:
   - Measure WebSocket connection performance under load
   - Test system behavior with high volume of simultaneous notifications
   - Verify database query performance for notification retrieval

5. User Acceptance Testing:
   - Verify notifications appear correctly for different user actions
   - Test notification preferences are respected across all notification types
   - Validate notification history displays correctly with proper timestamps
   - Test notification interactions (mark as read, dismiss, delete) function as expected

6. Cross-Browser/Device Testing:
   - Test notification functionality across different browsers
   - Verify mobile responsiveness of notification components
   - Test browser notifications on supported platforms

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Email Notification System
tasks.description: Create a complete email notification system that handles welcome emails, password resets, trading alerts, event notifications, premium subscription emails, and weekly digests with customizable templates and user preferences.
tasks.details:
This task involves building a robust email notification system with the following components:

1. Email Templates:
   - Create HTML/CSS templates for all email types using Laravel Blade
   - Implement responsive design for mobile compatibility
   - Design templates for: welcome emails, password reset, trading alerts, event notifications, premium subscription notifications, weekly digests
   - Include customizable sections for dynamic content
   - Ensure proper branding and styling consistency

2. Email Queue Processing:
   - Implement Laravel Queue for asynchronous email processing
   - Configure queue workers and supervisord for production
   - Set up retry mechanisms for failed email deliveries
   - Implement rate limiting to prevent email flooding
   - Add logging for email sending attempts and failures

3. Email Service Provider Integration:
   - Integrate with a reliable ESP (e.g., Mailgun, SendGrid, or Amazon SES)
   - Configure proper SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records
   - Set up webhook endpoints for tracking email events (opens, clicks, bounces)
   - Implement fallback providers in case of primary provider failure

4. User Email Preferences Management:
   - Create database schema for storing user email preferences
   - Build Livewire component for users to manage notification preferences
   - Implement granular control over notification types (trading alerts, events, digests, etc.)
   - Add frequency settings for digest emails (daily, weekly, monthly)
   - Include unsubscribe functionality in all emails

5. Email Triggers and Logic:
   - Implement event listeners for system events that trigger emails
   - Create dedicated notification classes for each email type
   - Add conditional logic for premium vs. free user content
   - Implement personalization based on user data and preferences
   - Set up scheduled tasks for recurring emails (weekly digests)

6. Email Analytics:
   - Track email open rates, click-through rates, and bounce rates
   - Create admin dashboard for email performance metrics
   - Implement A/B testing capability for email templates
   - Store and analyze user engagement with different email types

7. Integration with Existing Systems:
   - Connect with Trading Alert System for alert notifications
   - Integrate with Event Management System for event reminders
   - Link with User Authentication for welcome and password reset emails
   - Connect with Real-Time Notifications System for delivery coordination
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit Testing:
   - Test email template rendering with various data inputs
   - Verify email queue processing and retry mechanisms
   - Test email preference saving and retrieval
   - Validate conditional logic for different user types
   - Verify scheduled tasks for recurring emails

2. Integration Testing:
   - Test integration with ESP API (using sandbox/test environments)
   - Verify proper triggering of emails from system events
   - Test integration with Trading Alert System
   - Verify integration with Event Management System
   - Test coordination with Real-Time Notifications System

3. User Acceptance Testing:
   - Send test emails to various email clients (Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail)
   - Verify responsive design on mobile email clients
   - Test preference management UI for usability
   - Verify unsubscribe functionality works properly
   - Check personalization and dynamic content rendering

4. Performance Testing:
   - Test system under load with multiple simultaneous email requests
   - Verify queue processing efficiency
   - Measure email sending latency
   - Test rate limiting functionality

5. Security Testing:
   - Verify proper handling of email templates (no injection vulnerabilities)
   - Test authentication for email preference management
   - Verify proper encryption of sensitive data in emails
   - Test unsubscribe token security

6. Monitoring Setup:
   - Configure alerts for queue backlogs
   - Set up monitoring for failed email deliveries
   - Implement logging for all email activities
   - Create dashboard for email system health
